description: Given an input string, this function will make the string uppercase, lowercase, or capitalized.

inputs.description: String of which to change the case.
inputs.name: string_in

inputs.description:
The operation: (input: exaMple)
upper -> EXAMPLE
lower -> example
capitalise -> Example
swapcase -> EXAmPLE
inputs.name: string_operation

outputs.description: The final string in the desired case.
